name: Penguin Massacre
description:
In remote Antarctica, a American researcher and his dog are cast in a struggle for survival against waves of deadly brain-eating penguins as they wait for rescue.

Keep the generator on and protect your dog!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D  to move around
  • Left Shift to Run
  • E to Interact / Build Barriers
  • Mouse0 to use gas can
  • G to equip dynamite
  • 1 - 5 to switch weapons
  • Esc to pause

You can find me on twitter: @rockeyedev
